languages.text: Команда Вольного Торговца обнаружила на ледяном мире схрон, заполненный подозрительными веществами. Остается надеяться, что хозяин не сильно опечалится из-за пропажи.

traits.locale_text: Команда Вольного Торговца обнаружила на ледяном мире схрон, заполненный подозрительными веществами. Остается надеяться, что хозяин не сильно опечалится из-за пропажи.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.
languages.original_text: Команда Вольного Торговца обнаружила на ледяном мире схрон, заполненный подозрительными веществами. Остается надеяться, что хозяин не сильно опечалится из-за пропажи.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.

The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.

languages.text: 行商浪人的船员在某个冰冻的世界中发现了一处藏匿处。这个藏匿处装满了可疑的财宝，希望这些财宝的主人不要因为失去它们而过于悲伤。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的船员在某个冰冻的世界中发现了一处藏匿处。这个藏匿处装满了可疑的财宝，希望这些财宝的主人不要因为失去它们而过于悲伤。

languages.text: 自由開拓者のクルーは、氷結惑星の隠し場所を発見した。隠し場所には不審な物質だらけだった。所有者が損失に心を痛めないことだけを望もう。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者のクルーは、氷結惑星の隠し場所を発見した。隠し場所には不審な物質だらけだった。所有者が損失に心を痛めないことだけを望もう。

languages.text: La tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ha encontrado un alijo en un mundo helado. Está lleno de sustancias sospechosas. Esperemos que a su propietario no le importe perderlas.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ha encontrado un alijo en un mundo helado. Está lleno de sustancias sospechosas. Esperemos que a su propietario no le importe perderlas.

languages.text: Die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat auf einer gefrorenen Welt ein Lager entdeckt. Das Lager war mit verdächtigen Substanzen gefüllt. Man kann nur hoffen, dass der Besitzer ob ihres Verlustes nicht allzu wütend sein wird.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.

traits.locale_text: Die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat auf einer gefrorenen Welt ein Lager entdeckt. Das Lager war mit verdächtigen Substanzen gefüllt. Man kann nur hoffen, dass der Besitzer ob ihres Verlustes nicht allzu wütend sein wird.

languages.text: L'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a découvert une cache dans un monde gelé. La cache était remplie de substances suspectes. Espérons que son propriétaire ne sera pas trop peiné de cette perte.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.

traits.locale_text: L'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a découvert une cache dans un monde gelé. La cache était remplie de substances suspectes. Espérons que son propriétaire ne sera pas trop peiné de cette perte.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in mürettebatı, bir donuk dünyada zula keşfetti. Zula, bazı şüpheli maddelerle doluydu. Sahibinin bunları kaybettiği için çok kızmayacağını ummaktan başka yapacak bir şey yok.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew discovered a cache on a frozen world. The cache was filled with suspicious substances. One can only hope the owner will not be too aggrieved by their loss.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in mürettebatı, donmuş bir dünyada bir zula keşfetti. Zula, bazı şüpheli maddelerle doluydu. Sahibinin bunları kaybettiği için çok kızmayacağını ummaktan başka yapacak bir şey yok.
